item.title: Week1: Let OOP begins
item.description:
Hello World,

tips-of-the-week

  • learn git with this cheat sheet
$ adding code
  • Python-2 VS Python-3 cheat sheet
  • Add sudo: required to .travis.yml when you have sudo: setuid root error because of the student package limitation
  • If you already hosted your website using <username>.github.io, you can make a new repository for your blog and create a gh-pages branch to have your own blog hosting separately from your actual website. In addition, you can also create a github page for your project by doing the same thing! Hereâ€™s how!
